techmeme.title: Hands-on with Apple's hearing health features, set to roll out in iOS 18.1: hearing protection in all AirPods modes, a hearing test, and AirPods hearing aids (Chris Welch/The Verge)
ByteDance says it fired an intern in its ad tech team for "maliciously interfering" with AI training, and says operations were unaffected by their actions (João da Silva/BBC)
Investigation: a Russian espionage and hacking campaign targeted Georgia for years and breached its Foreign Ministry, Finance Ministry, central bank, and more (Bloomberg)
Microsoft unveils 10 new AI agents for its enterprise-focused Dynamics 365 apps covering sales, finance, and more, ahead of Salesforce's Agentforce availability (Todd Bishop/GeekWire)
IBM launches its open source Granite 3.0 models, including 2B and 8B general purpose versions and Mixture-of-Experts models, aimed at enterprise customers (Sean Michael Kerner/VentureBeat)
